SEARCH
Module brickGame
Package brickGame.View

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
brickGame.View.GameView
public class GameView extends Object
The GameView class represents the graphical user interface for the Brick Breaker game. It handles the initialization and updating of the game elements on the screen.
